questions.question: Which of the following is a consequence of ambiguity in CFGs?
What is the key difference between a leftmost derivation and a rightmost derivation in context-free grammars?

answers.a: The direction in which non-terminals are expanded
answers.b: The number of production rules used
answers.d: The length of the input string

questions.question: How can ambiguity be resolved in a CFG?

answers.a: By making the grammar more complex
answers.d: By rewriting the grammar to make it unambiguous
